  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.assignPolicies(String, Set)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use: com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.checkNonce(String, String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use other means to verify nounce.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.createPolicyTemplate(String, Map)
    use com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.createPolicyTemplate(String, Map, int)
    use com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
    com.sun.identity.idm.AMIdentityRepository.deleteIdentities(IdType, Set)
    As of release AM 7.1, replaced by AMIdentityRepository.deleteIdentities(Set)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getAccountFedInfo(HttpServletRequest, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.iplanet.services.cdm.Client.getAllInstances()
    Use ClientsManager#getAllInstances()
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getAttributeNames(String, AMSchema.Type)
    use com.sun.identity.sm.ServiceSchemaManager. getServiceAttributeNames(com.sun.identity.sm.SchemaType)
    com.sun.identity.federation.services.FSAttributePlugin.getAttributeStatements(String, String, FSSubject, Object)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getAuthnContext(HttpServletRequest, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.identity.sm.OrganizationConfigManager.getConfiguredServices()
    This method has been deprecated, use getAssignedServices() instead.
    com.iplanet.services.cdm.Client.getDefaultInstance()
    Use ClientsManager#getDefaultInstance()
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getDiscoveryBootStrapCredentials(HttpServletRequest, String)
    This method has been deprecated. Use LibertyManager.getDiscoveryBootStrapCredentials( HttpServletRequest request, String providerID, String providerRole)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getDiscoveryBootStrapResourceOfferings(HttpServletRequest, String)
    This method has been deprecated. Use LibertyManager.getDiscoveryBootStrapResourceOfferings( HttpServletRequest request, String providerID, String providerRole)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getErrorPageURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getErrorPageURL(String,String,String,HttpServletRequest)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getFederatedProviders(String, String, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getFederationDonePageURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getFederationDonePageURL(String, String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getFilteredRoleNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getGroupContainerNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getGroupNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getHomeURL(String, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getIDPFederationStatus(String, String, String, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getIDPList()
    This method has been deprecated. Please use getAllIDPList(String realm) instead.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getIDPList(String)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getIDPList(String,String)
    com.iplanet.services.cdm.Client.getInstance(String)
    Use ClientsManager#getInstance(String)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getListOfCOTs(String, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getMetaAlias(String, String)
    This method is deprecated by getMetaAlias(String,String,String).
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getNameRegistrationDonePageURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getNameRegistrationDonePageURL( String,String,String,HttpServletRequest)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getNameRegistrationURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getNonce(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use other means to generate nounce.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getOrganizationalUnitNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)

    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getPeopleContainerNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.iplanet.am.util.SystemProperties.getPlatform()
    use getAll()
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.getPolicy(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use: com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getPolicyTemplate(String) 
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.getPolicyTemplate(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use: com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
    com.sun.identity.federation.services.FSIDPProxy.getPreferredIDP(FSAuthnRequest, String, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getPreLoginServletURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getProvidersToFederate(String, String, String)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getProvidersToFederate(String, String, String,String)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getRegisteredProviders(String, String, String)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getRegisteredProviders(String,String,String,String)
    com.sun.identity.policy.PolicyEvaluator.getResourceResult(SSOToken, String, String, Map)
    Use getResourceResults()
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getRoleNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getSchema(String, AMSchema.Type)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use com.sun.identity.sm.ServiceSchemaManager.getSchema() .
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getSchemaTypes(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use com.sun.identity.sm.ServiceSchemaManager.getSchemaTypes() .
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.getServiceAttributes(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use service template objects to obtain service attributes.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getSPFederationStatus(String, String, String, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getSPList()
    This method is deprecated. Please use getAllSPList(String realm).
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getSPList(String)
    This method is deprecated. Please use getSPList(String,String)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getSuccinctID(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Use LibertyManager.getSuccinctID(String, String)
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getTerminationDonePageURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.getTerminationURL(String, String, HttpServletRequest)
    This method is deprecated
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMStoreConnection.getUserNamingAttribute()
    This method is deprecated. Use getNamingAttribute(int objectType)
    com.sun.identity.authentication.spi.AMLoginModule.getUserProfile(String)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use the IdRepo API's to get the AMIdentity object for the user. More information on how to use the Identity Repository APIs is available in the OpenSSO Developer's Guide.
    com.sun.identity.sae.api.SecureAttrs.init(Properties)
    For backward compatability with older releases of this api. Replaced by SecureAttrs.init(String,String,Properties)
    com.sun.identity.idm.IdSearchControl.isRecursive()
    This method is deprecated. The setting for recursive search should be configured via the data store.
    com.sun.identity.idm.IdRepoListener.objectChanged(String, int, Map)
    As of Sun Java System Access Manager 7.1.
    com.sun.liberty.LibertyManager.setAuthnRequest(FSAuthnRequest, String)
    This method is deprecated.
    com.sun.identity.idm.IdSearchControl.setRecursive(boolean)
    This method is deprecated. The setting for recursive search should be configured via the data store.
    com.iplanet.am.sdk.AMObject.unassignPolicies(String, Set)
    This method has been deprecated. Please use: com.sun.identity.policy package for creating and managing policies.
